channel.title: Young Couple Gaming: Pokémon GO Podcast
channel.itunes:subtitle: A Young Couple talking about the Pocket Monsters on their phones and the places they go.
channel.itunes:author: Young Couple Gaming
channel.itunes:summary: Young Couple Gaming: Pokémon GO Podcast is a show about Adam and Taylor’s adventures with the popular mobile game, Pokémon GO! Weekly, they discuss Pokémon GO news and their recent adventures within the game.
channel.description: Young Couple Gaming: Pokémon GO Podcast is a show about Adam and Taylor’s adventures with the popular mobile game, Pokémon GO! Weekly, they discuss Pokémon GO news and their recent adventures within the game.

item.itunes:title: "The Inaugural Episode"
item.title: YCG:PGP 001 - "The Inaugural Episode"
item.itunes:author: Young Couple Gaming
item.itunes:subtitle:
Well, we said we were going to do it, and we did it. Welcome to the first episode of the Young Couple Gaming: Pokémon GO Podcast! In this episode, we introduce ourselves, recap the Larvitar Community Day, give our opinions on the Water Fest, and look forward to the news about the Summer Tour Global Challenge.
Opening and Closing Song Taken from the Pokémon Go Remix - IT'S TIME TO GO! - Dj CUTMAN ft. CG5 from GameChops

item.content:encoded:
Well, we said we were going to do it, and we did it. Welcome to the first episode of the Young Couple Gaming: Pokémon GO Podcast! In this episode, we introduce ourselves, recap the Larvitar Community Day, give our opinions on the Water Fest, and look forward to the news about the Summer Tour Global Challenge.
Opening and Closing Song Taken from the Pokémon Go Remix - IT'S TIME TO GO! - Dj CUTMAN ft. CG5 from GameChops

item.itunes:title: "Back At It Again"
item.title: YCG:PGP 002 - "Back At It Again"
item.itunes:author: Young Couple Gaming
item.itunes:subtitle:
We're back at it and managed to not give up after one episode. In this one, we talk about the newly announced community day, discuss the newest raid “bosses”, forget that Dortmund, Germany is a thing this weekend, make a hot and oh so wrong take on Snorlax research tasks in July, get excited about the new Alola boys in the wild, and go over the newest update which brings along trading and friends! Please, please be our friend.
Opening and Closing Song from the Pokémon Go Remix - IT'S TIME TO GO! - Dj CUTMAN ft. CG5 from GameChops
